name: Rai Reflex Index
description: RAI is a non pegged, ETH backed stable asset built by Reflexer. It is the first asset of its kind that, instead of being pegged to a specific target such as the USD, it freely floats while it's being influenced by market forces. RAI's mission is to become a crypto native and governance minimized stable asset that is detached from fiat.

en.description: RAI is a non pegged, ETH backed stable asset built by Reflexer. It is the first asset of its kind that, instead of being pegged to a specific target such as the USD, it freely floats while it's being influenced by market forces. es.description: RAI es un activo estable no vinculado respaldado por ETH y creado por Reflexer. Es el primer activo de este tipo que, en lugar de estar vinculado a un objetivo específico como el USD, flota libremente mientras recibe la influencia de las fuerzas del mercado. La misión de RAI es convertirse en un activo estable criptográfico y minimizado de gobierno que se separe del fiat.

It is the first asset of its kind that, instead of being pegged to a specific target such as the USD, it freely floats while it's being influenced by market forces. tr.description: RAI, Reflexer tarafından oluşturulmuş, sabitlenmemiş, ETH destekli stabil bir varlıktır. USD gibi belirli bir hedefe sabitlenmek yerine, piyasa güçlerinden etkilenirken serbestçe dalgalanan türünün ilk varlığıdır. RAI'nin misyonu, bir kripto yerlisi olmak ve fiat'tan bağımsız, yönetişimi minimize edilmiş istikrarlı bir varlık olmaktır.

vi.description: RAI is a non pegged, ETH backed stable asset built by Reflexer. It is the first asset of its kind that, instead of being pegged to a specific target such as the USD, it freely floats while it's being influenced by market forces. RAI's mission is to become a crypto native and governance minimized stable asset that is detached from fiat.

zh.description: RAI 是由 Reflexer 发行的以 ETH 为抵押资产的非锚定美元的稳定资产。RAI 与众不同，它是首款不以美元做为价格标准的资产，它的价格是完全由市场来决定的。RAI 的目标是成为加密原生的、最小化治理而且与法币无连接的稳定资产。

hi.description: RAI, Reflexer द्वारा निर्मित एक गैर-आंकी गई, ETH समर्थित स्थिर संपत्ति है। यह अपनी तरह की पहली संपत्ति है, जो कि USD जैसे विशिष्ट लक्ष्य के लिए आंकी जाने के बजाय, बाजार की ताकतों से प्रभावित होने पर स्वतंत्र रूप से तैरती है। RAI का मिशन एक क्रिप्टो मूल निवासी बनना है और शासन को स्थिर संपत्ति को कम करना है जो कि फिएट से अलग है।
